title: Finish the BSA 2017 Homework by Javascript Calendar
description: Be sure to finish the BSA 2017 Javascript homework, because today is the last day for it! And do not forget to send it to Volodymyr Kushnir for check!

title: Visit the football match
description: Visit a football match in which FC Prykarpattya Ivano-Frankivsk and FC Polissya Zhytomyr will participate. The match will take place at the stadium "Rukh" in Ivano-Frankivsk, beginning at 18:00. Do not forget the ticket, please! :-)

title: Finish the BSA 2017 Homework by React JS
description: Be sure to finish the BSA 2017 React JS homework, because it is the last day for it! And do not forget to send it for check!

title: BSA 2017 PHP Project. Meeting
description: Meeting with the coach of the BSA PHP group.
todo_list: definition of key tasks and time frames for their implementation
definition of development tools, libraries etc. needed to perform these tasks
and ... work, coding with best wishes to all! :-)

title: Clean in the apartment
todo_list: wipe the dust off the furniture
find the vacuum cleaner and use it for the purpose :-)
the mop is also useful (just do not pour a lot of water!) :-))
